caption: They ran for a long time in the forest, but were still caught up by two soldiers. Vesper was very familiar with the environment here, suddenly she came up with an idea. She took Camellia to a place with many red bushes. They passed through the bushes carefully and without touching them. But the soldiers did not know these creatures, when they arrived, they directly stepped on them. In an instant, many insects flew out of the bushes and killed two soldiers. Camellia believed that the soldiers were only here to catch herself and she should not implicate Vesper. After Vesper fell asleep, she left quietly.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story or something else like science fiction movie or magical stories?)

global.answer: Both at day time and at night time.
